author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Ethiopian Airlines crowned Best International Airline of the yearTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Ethiopian Airlines crowned Best International Airline of the year
Ethiopian Airlines has been named the Best International Airline of the year by Business Executive Excellence Awards in Accra, Ghana. Ethiopian Airlines is the largest and fastest growing African Airline. The award was received by Genet W/Michael, Ethiopian Area Manager in Accra.
Ethiopian won the award for its best performance and for its great contribution to Ghana’s economy in general.
According to a statement obtained from the airlines, the Business Excellence Awards celebrates institutions that demonstrate excellence in leadership, performance and success with a significant impact to Ghana’s economic growth.
“Ethiopian is consistently providing the best possible connectivity options between Accra and the rest of the World as well as within Africa,” said Michael.
Ethiopian fleet includes ultra-modern and environmentally friendly aircraft such as the Boeing 787, Boeing 777-300ER, Boeing 777-200LR, Boeing 777-200 Freighter and Bombardier Q-400 with double cabin. In fact, Ethiopian is the first airline in Africa to own and operate these aircraft.
